name: Create Document
description: Create a new document in the MongoDB data page.

name: Save Document
description: Save the changes made to the current document on the MongoDB data page.

name: Open Document
description: Open an existing document from the MongoDB data page.

name: Undo
description: Undo the last action performed on the MongoDB data page.

name: Redo
description: Redo the last undone action on the MongoDB data page.

name: Copy
description: Copy selected data or text on the MongoDB data page.

name: Cut
description: Cut selected data or text on the MongoDB data page.

name: Paste
description: Paste copied or cut data or text on the MongoDB data page.

name: Select All
description: Select all content on th``e MongoDB data page.

name: Find
description: Open the find dialog to search for specific content within the MongoDB data page.
